name: Night City
description:
This is a simulator of loneliness in the city of the future. In this game you can walk around the apartment and around the city, looking at the surroundings.

Features:
Cyberpunk atmosphere
Modern graphics
Interactive environment

Controls:
W, A, S, D - move
LMB - interact with objects
CTRL - crouch
ALT - walk slowly
Shift - sprint
Space - jump
